leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研代理-工具调用与工作流编排生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 规划→调用→追踪→回放→评测→治理

queries: [WEB] jupyter notebook ai copilot extension github
[WEB] human in the loop agent interface github
[WEB] open source research assistant ui github
[WEB] interactive llm agent framework python github
[WEB] scientific workflow human feedback ui github

tools.name: jupyter_plz
tools.one_line_profile: AI copilot extension for Jupyter notebooks to assist in scientific coding
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter notebook extension that integrates LLM capabilities directly into the notebook environment. It allows users to generate code, debug errors, and perform data manipulation tasks using natural language prompts via a magic command, streamlining the scientific computing workflow.

tools.name: Chainlit
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Python framework for building conversational AI and agent interfaces
tools.detailed_description: Chainlit is a Python framework designed to build scalable conversational AI applications. In the context of AI for Science, it serves as a critical infrastructure for creating human-in-the-loop interfaces for scientific agents, enabling visualization of reasoning steps (Chain of Thought), tool usage, and multi-modal data interaction (e.g., plotting, molecule rendering).

tools.name: FfDL
tools.one_line_profile: Fabric for Deep Learning - A Deep Learning Platform on Kubernetes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning platform offering TensorFlow, Caffe, PyTorch, and other frameworks as a service on Kubernetes, enabling scalable model training and orchestration for scientific research.

tools.name: JohnSnowLabs NLU
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for state-of-the-art Natural Language Processing
tools.detailed_description: A library providing easy access to thousands of state-of-the-art NLP models in multiple languages, facilitating text analysis, named entity recognition, and other linguistic tasks for research.

tools.name: OpenCodeInterpreter
tools.one_line_profile: Code generation system bridging LLMs and execution for data analysis
tools.detailed_description: OpenCodeInterpreter is a suite of open-source code generation systems aimed at bridging the gap between large language models and sophisticated proprietary systems like the GPT-4 Code Interpreter. It significantly enhances code generation capabilities by integrating execution and iterative refinement functionalities, making it highly suitable for scientific data analysis and computational tasks.

tools.name: Ask-Anything
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal video understanding and question answering platform
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal platform enabling ChatGPT to understand and interact with video content, supporting various large models for video question answering and analysis. It serves as a research tool for extracting insights from dynamic visual data.

tools.name: InternGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive multimodal demo platform for image editing and visual chat
tools.detailed_description: InternGPT (iGPT) is an open source demo platform that integrates multiple AI models like DragGAN, ChatGPT, and SAM for multimodal tasks including interactive image editing and visual chat, serving as a workbench for exploring visual AI capabilities.

tools.name: Multi-Modality-Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for vision-language models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform for evaluating vision-language models side-by-side, allowing researchers to compare model performance on multimodal inputs and scientific visual tasks.

tools.name: Calcpad
tools.one_line_profile: Mathematical and engineering calculation software
tools.detailed_description: Free and open source software for mathematical and engineering calculations that allows creating programmable calculation sheets with automatic report generation, suitable for scientific modeling and documentation.

tools.name: DeepLiterature
tools.one_line_profile: Intelligent research assistant for literature review and code execution
tools.detailed_description: A fully open-source intelligent research assistant that integrates search, code execution, link resolution, and information expansion, with multiple tools working together to facilitate scientific research and literature review workflows.

tools.name: chat-gpt-jupyter-extension
tools.one_line_profile: AI coding assistant extension for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A browser extension to provide various AI helper functions in Jupyter Notebooks, powered by ChatGPT. It acts as a copilot for researchers, assisting with code generation, debugging, and explanation within the scientific data analysis environment.

tools.name: AIAgents4Pharma
tools.one_line_profile: AI Agents framework specifically designed for pharmaceutical R&D
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AI agents and tools tailored for drug discovery and development processes. It leverages LLMs to assist in various stages of pharmaceutical research, providing a specialized workflow for this domain.

tools.name: thread
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered Jupyter Notebook environment for scientific coding
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Jupyter Notebook interface enhanced with local AI capabilities. It allows users to generate, edit, and fix code cells using AI models, acting as a copilot specifically for data science and scientific computing workflows.

tools.name: MedGraph AI
tools.one_line_profile: Healthcare RAG agent using Neo4j knowledge graphs for medical data querying
tools.detailed_description: A healthcare-focused RAG agent that leverages Neo4j knowledge graphs to structure and query medical data. It integrates LangChain, FastAPI, and Streamlit to provide an interface for retrieving medical information and insights.

tools.name: GPT Researcher
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous agent for comprehensive online research and report generation
tools.detailed_description: An autonomous agent designed to conduct deep online research on a given topic. It aggregates information from multiple sources, filters for reliability, and generates detailed research reports with citations, automating the literature review and information gathering process.

tools.name: Jupyter Copilot
tools.one_line_profile: GitHub Copilot extension for JupyterLab environment
tools.detailed_description: A browser extension that integrates GitHub Copilot into JupyterLab, assisting researchers and data scientists with code completion and generation directly within their scientific computing environment.

tools.name: OpenInterpreterUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical User Interface for Open Interpreter code execution
tools.detailed_description: A Streamlit-based graphical interface for Open Interpreter, allowing users to execute Python and JavaScript code via natural language commands. It facilitates interactive data analysis and scripting without needing a command-line interface.

tools.name: AutoAI
tools.one_line_profile: Automated AI framework for regression and classification on numerical data
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework that automates the process of model search and hyper-parameter tuning for regression and classification tasks on numerical datasets. It also generates high-quality Jupyter Notebook code for the selected models, aiding in reproducible research.

tools.name: CAMEL Multi-Agent UI
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit UI for CAMEL multi-agent framework
tools.detailed_description: A web-based user interface for the CAMEL framework, enabling users to configure and run multi-agent systems for task-driven simulations and dynamic environments. Useful for researching agent behaviors and automated problem solving.

tools.name: Langchain-Chatchat
tools.one_line_profile: Local knowledge base RAG and Agent application
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and Agent application based on Langchain. It allows researchers to build local knowledge bases from documents and interact with them using LLMs, facilitating literature review and knowledge management without data leaving the local environment.

tools.name: Feifei Deep Research
tools.one_line_profile: Deep research agent adapted for Chinese developers
tools.detailed_description: An adaptation of the open-deep-research tool, integrated with Chainlit to provide a convenient interface for conducting deep research tasks. It automates the process of gathering and synthesizing information from the web.

tools.name: Prettymapp
tools.one_line_profile: Webapp to create maps from OpenStreetMap data
tools.detailed_description: A Streamlit web application that allows users to create and customize maps using data from OpenStreetMap. It is useful for geospatial visualization and generating map figures for research.

tools.name: Data Analysis LLM Agent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered agent for database querying and visualization
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent designed to assist with data analysis tasks. It can query databases using natural language and visualize the results, streamlining the workflow from data retrieval to insight generation.

tools.name: Natural Language to SQL
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language interface for SQL databases
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables users to chat with their database by converting natural language queries into SQL. It uses LangChain and Streamlit to provide a friendly UI for interacting with BigQuery or MySQL databases, facilitating data retrieval for analysis.

tools.name: Ragbase
tools.one_line_profile: Local RAG tool for chatting with PDF documents
tools.detailed_description: A completely local RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) tool that allows users to chat with PDF documents. It utilizes LangChain, Streamlit, Ollama, and Qdrant to provide secure and private document analysis and information retrieval.

tools.name: LibreChat
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced web interface for LLMs with support for Agents, Code Interpreter, and RAG
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive, open-source chat interface that serves as a platform for human-AI collaboration. It supports multiple model providers, plugins, and features a Code Interpreter and Agent capabilities, making it suitable for interactive scientific inference and data analysis workflows.

tools.name: Jupyter AI Agents
tools.one_line_profile: AI Agents extension for JupyterLab with MCP tool support
tools.detailed_description: An extension for JupyterLab that integrates AI agents directly into the notebook environment. It utilizes the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to allow agents to interact with the notebook, execute code, and assist in scientific data analysis and workflow management.

tools.name: Jupyter MCP Server
tools.one_line_profile: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server implementation for Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A server implementation that exposes Jupyter's capabilities (kernel execution, file access) via the Model Context Protocol (MCP). This infrastructure enables external AI agents and LLMs to interface with Jupyter notebooks to perform scientific computation and data processing.

tools.name: Octogen
tools.one_line_profile: Open-Source Code Interpreter Agent Framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to build autonomous agents capable of interpreting and executing code. It serves as a foundational tool for creating 'Code Interpreter' style agents that can perform data analysis, visualization, and solving tasks via generated code.

tools.name: Deepnote
tools.one_line_profile: AI-first collaborative data science notebook platform
tools.detailed_description: A modern data science platform that replaces standard Jupyter notebooks with a collaborative, AI-enhanced interface. It features built-in AI agents for code generation and analysis, real-time collaboration, and native data integrations, specifically designed for scientific and data workflows.

tools.name: Deep Research
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered agent for iterative deep research and literature review
tools.detailed_description: An autonomous agent designed to perform deep, iterative research on a given topic. It combines search engines, web scraping, and LLMs to refine research directions and synthesize information, automating the literature review and information gathering phase of scientific research.

tools.name: E2B Code Interpreter
tools.one_line_profile: SDK for secure sandboxed code execution for AI agents
tools.detailed_description: A library providing secure, sandboxed environments for AI agents to execute code. This is a critical infrastructure tool for building scientific agents that need to perform data analysis, run simulations, or generate visualizations via Python or JavaScript code.

tools.name: LetMeDoIt
tools.one_line_profile: AI assistant for executing local computing tasks and automation
tools.detailed_description: An advanced AI assistant leveraging AutoGen and various LLMs to execute computing tasks on local devices. It functions as an agentic tool for automating data processing workflows and system interactions.

tools.name: Elyra
tools.one_line_profile: Visual pipeline editor and workflow orchestration for JupyterLab
tools.detailed_description: An extension for JupyterLab that provides a visual editor for building and running data science pipelines. It enables researchers to orchestrate complex workflows involving notebooks, scripts, and data processing steps without leaving the Jupyter environment.

tools.name: spaCy-Streamlit
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization building blocks for spaCy NLP models in Streamlit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing Streamlit components for visualizing spaCy NLP model outputs, such as named entities, dependency parses, and text classification results. It facilitates the creation of interactive tools for linguistic analysis and NLP model inspection.

tools.name: Otto-m8
tools.one_line_profile: Visual flowchart UI for interconnecting LLMs and deploying workflows
tools.detailed_description: A low-code tool providing a flowchart-like user interface to connect Large Language Models (LLMs) and HuggingFace models. It allows researchers to visually design and deploy AI workflows as REST APIs, facilitating rapid prototyping of complex inference pipelines.

tools.name: Open Deep Research
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source AI agent for deep research and synthesis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source alternative to proprietary deep research tools. It functions as an agent that performs comprehensive research on topics by querying multiple sources and synthesizing findings, aiding in the literature review process.

tools.name: RAGxplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) systems
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool designed to visualize the retrieval process in RAG systems. It helps researchers understand document chunking, embedding spaces, and retrieval relevance, which is essential for debugging and optimizing AI-driven scientific knowledge bases.

tools.name: geemap
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive geospatial analysis and visualization with Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for interactive mapping and geospatial analysis with Google Earth Engine (GEE). It enables scientists to visualize and analyze satellite imagery and geospatial datasets within Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: Jupyter AI
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI extension for JupyterLab to assist in scientific coding and data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that brings generative AI to the notebook environment. It enables users to generate code, explain errors, summarize content, and interact with their data using natural language, acting as a copilot for scientific computing and data science workflows.

tools.name: Generative Manim
tools.one_line_profile: GPT-based code generator for Manim mathematical animations
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages GPT models to automatically generate Python code for Manim (Mathematical Animation Engine), facilitating the creation of scientific and mathematical visualizations.

tools.name: PID-agent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based platform for PID controller parameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: An agentic platform integrating LangChain and LLMs to assist in the tuning of PID (Proportional-Integral-Derivative) controller parameters, relevant for control engineering and laboratory automation tasks.

tools.name: CoML
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive coding assistant for data scientists
tools.detailed_description: A research prototype by Microsoft designed to assist data scientists and machine learning developers with code generation and data analysis tasks through an interactive natural language interface.

tools.name: Responsible AI Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of tools for assessing and debugging AI models and data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of user interfaces and libraries enabling model and data exploration, error analysis, fairness assessment, and interpretability, which are critical for scientific model validation and analysis.

tools.name: Responsible AI Toolbox Tracker
tools.one_line_profile: JupyterLab extension for tracking Responsible AI experiments
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that facilitates the tracking, management, and comparison of Responsible AI mitigations and experiments within the data science workflow.

tools.name: TensorWatch
tools.one_line_profile: Debugging and visualization tool for Data Science and ML
tools.detailed_description: A tool for debugging, monitoring, and visualizing machine learning models and data streams in Python, designed to support data science workflows and real-time analysis.

tools.name: Mito
tools.one_line_profile: Spreadsheet and AI coding assistant for Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter extension that provides a spreadsheet interface and context-aware AI chat to generate Python code for data analysis, streamlining the scientific data processing workflow.

tools.name: PlotAI
tools.one_line_profile: AI assistant for creating Matplotlib plots
tools.detailed_description: A tool that utilizes LLMs (ChatGPT) to generate Python and Matplotlib code for data visualization directly within scripts or notebooks, assisting in scientific plotting tasks.

tools.name: cad3dify
tools.one_line_profile: 2D to 3D CAD conversion tool using Vision Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages Vision Language Models (VLMs) to convert 2D CAD drawings into 3D CAD models, facilitating engineering design and modeling workflows.

tools.name: GeoAI
tools.one_line_profile: Artificial Intelligence toolkit for geospatial data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for applying artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to geospatial data, supporting tasks like image segmentation and object detection in satellite imagery.

tools.name: leafmap
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive mapping and geospatial analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for interactive mapping and geospatial analysis with minimal coding in a Jupyter environment, enabling visualization and processing of Earth science data.

tools.name: streamlit-geospatial
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for geospatial data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A multi-page Streamlit application that provides a user interface for various geospatial analysis tasks, making geospatial tools accessible without extensive coding.

tools.name: Open Interpreter
tools.one_line_profile: Local code interpreter for automating data analysis and workflows
tools.detailed_description: A natural language interface for computers that can write and execute code locally. In scientific contexts, it acts as a research agent for automating data analysis, visualization, and file manipulation workflows.

tools.name: GPT Code UI
tools.one_line_profile: Open source implementation of ChatGPT Code Interpreter for data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based user interface that replicates the functionality of the OpenAI Code Interpreter, providing a sandboxed environment for AI-driven data analysis, code generation, and visualization. It serves as a critical tool for scientific workflows requiring interactive code execution and data exploration.

tools.name: DeepAnalyze
tools.one_line_profile: Agentic LLM framework for autonomous data science and reporting
tools.detailed_description: An autonomous data science agent developed by RUC DataLab that automates the entire data analysis pipeline, including data preprocessing, statistical analysis, and report generation. It functions as an AI data analyst to assist researchers in deriving insights from large datasets.

tools.name: CodeInterpreter API
tools.one_line_profile: Library providing sandboxed code execution for AI data analysis agents
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of the Code Interpreter pattern, providing a Python API to spin up sandboxed environments for LLMs to execute code, generate charts, and analyze data. It serves as a foundational library for building scientific research agents.

tools.name: Notebook Copilot
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered CLI tool for generating Jupyter Notebooks from natural language
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface tool that leverages Large Language Models to generate fully functional Jupyter Notebooks based on user descriptions. It streamlines the workflow for data scientists and researchers by automating the initial setup and coding of analysis notebooks.

tools.name: Vanna Chainlit
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational UI for Vanna text-to-SQL framework
tools.detailed_description: The official Chainlit-based user interface for Vanna, enabling researchers and data scientists to interact with SQL databases using natural language. It facilitates data extraction and analysis by converting questions into SQL queries within a chat interface.

tools.name: AutoGen UI
tools.one_line_profile: Web user interface for AutoGen multi-agent framework
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for the AutoGen framework, allowing users to define, manage, and observe multi-agent workflows. It supports the orchestration of AI agents for complex problem-solving tasks, including research and data analysis scenarios.

tools.name: Libro
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible and customizable notebook environment for data science
tools.detailed_description: A notebook environment designed to offer enhanced customization and integration capabilities compared to standard Jupyter interfaces. It serves as a platform for scientific data analysis, coding, and interactive research workflows.

tools.name: Mahilo
tools.one_line_profile: A human-in-the-loop multi-agent orchestration framework
tools.detailed_description: Mahilo is a framework designed for creating multi-agent systems that incorporate human interaction (HITL). It enables agents to share context and collaborate with humans to solve complex tasks, fitting the scientific agent workflow paradigm.

tools.name: MASSW
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for Multi-Aspect Summarization of Scientific Workflows
tools.detailed_description: MASSW is a comprehensive text dataset specifically designed for the analysis and summarization of scientific workflows. It includes over 152,000 peer-reviewed publications from computer science conferences, serving as a resource for researching scientific process automation and documentation.

tools.name: Code Atlas
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of Open Interpreter for agentic code execution
tools.detailed_description: Code Atlas is a C++ implementation of the Open Interpreter protocol. It serves as a local execution engine enabling AI agents to write and run code to perform data analysis and system tasks, a key component in agentic scientific workflows.

tools.name: LLaMA-LoRA-Tuner
tools.one_line_profile: UI tool for fine-tuning LLaMA-based models using LoRA
tools.detailed_description: A graphical interface and toolkit for fine-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) using Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA). It facilitates the adaptation of general models to specific domains (including scientific domains) through an accessible workflow.
